segments.text: How about your grades of study ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have been doing quite well . As reach 90 % and Bs reach 100 % . And I ’ Ve received Scholarship two times .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Besides your major , do you know some in other fields ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . To develop my knowledge , I studied Economics , Business Administration and Accountingthrough self-study . Nowadays , I have passed three courses on CPA .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever been a student cadre ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I used to be the monitor of my class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s a very important experience for me . First , it improved my organizing ability , and let me understand how to resolve a problem in the overall perspective instead of my own perspective . Second , it let me know how to cooperate in harmony with people who I like or dislike .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In your spare time , do you have any part time jobs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I used to work as an assistant lawyer for Tienda Law Office .
segments.speaker: S2
